Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Component Ma.EXPLANATION: The percentage of products that meet quality standards out of the total produced.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Component Ma.FORMULA: (Number of Good Units Produced / Total Units Produced) * 100

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Component Ma.EXPLANATION: The total time from the beginning to the end of a production process for a single product.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Component Ma.FORMULA: Total Time to Produce One Unit

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Component Ma.EXPLANATION: The percentage of production time lost due to machine or process downtime.
The percentage of materials or products discarded due to defects or errors.
The percentage of time machines are used for production versus available time.
The average cost incurred to produce one unit of product.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Component Ma.FORMULA: Total Production Cost / Total Units Produced

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Component Ma.EXPLANATION: The percentage of products that pass quality control checks.
Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Component Ma.FORMULA: (Number of Units Passing Quality Control / Total Units Inspected) * 100

Manufacturing+Manufacturing+Component Ma.EXPLANATION: The total number of products produced in a specific period.
